text.div:
COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Aortic Aneurysm

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    12232008 Syphilitic aneurysm of aorta (disorder)
    14336007 Ruptured abdominal aortic aneurysm (disorder)
    16972009 Congenital aneurysm of aorta (disorder)
    195258006 Thoracic aortic aneurysm which has ruptured (disorder)
    195265003 Thoracoabdominal aortic aneurysm, ruptured (disorder)
    195268001 Leaking abdominal aortic aneurysm (disorder)
    233984007 Thoracoabdominal aortic aneurysm (disorder)
    233985008 Abdominal aortic aneurysm (disorder)

    450801000124102 Abdominal aortic aneurysm greater than 5.5 centimeters in male (disorder)
    54160000 Congenital aneurysm of sinus of Valsalva (disorder)
    67362008 Aortic aneurysm (disorder)

    715364001 Familial abdominal aortic aneurysm (disorder)
